title: Chocolate fudge squares
ingredients: ['For the fudge squares', '110g (4 oz) self raising flour', '1 level teaspoon baking powder', '2 level teaspoons cocoa powder', '110g (4 oz) soft margarine', '110g (4 oz) caster sugar', '3 eggs', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '30g (1 oz) ground almonds (optional)', 'For the icing', '200g (7 oz) icing sugar, sifted', '90g (3 oz) soft margarine', '2 heaped tablespoons drinking chocolate powder', '1 tablespoon hot water', '2 tablespoons milk', 'icing sugar, for sprinkling']
